notes.title: Sender’s Address
notes.body: The sender’s address is notated in the top right-hand corner of the page or centered, as if it were the letterhead. The address should be a complete and accurate address for the recipient, in case the recipient needs to reach out to the sender for any reason.

notes.title: Иммутабельность
notes.body: Иммутабельные объекты – неизмеримо мощный феномен в программировании.
